content.query:
-- devs.csv
-- first,last
-- hiram,fleitas
-- christina,sosa
-- brent,carpenetti

create view demoserverless  as 
select    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/devs.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    ) AS [result]
